title.rendered: Official Samsung EP-TA800 3 Pin UK Super Fast Charging Travel Charger Power Adapter for S10/Note 10/10+ – Black

content.rendered:
Give all of your gadgets the power they want. With the wall charger that gives as much as 25W of energy you’ll all the time have an Ultra-Quick cost accessible. The energy adapter brings all of your gadgets again to life, not simply the quickest ones. As lengthy as they’re appropriate with the PD 3.0 customary, you possibly can cost all of your gadgets to the utmost energy of 25W. Ultra-fast charging requires a USB PD 3.0 appropriate gadget that helps direct charging. Devices that don’t help the USB PD 3.0 customary or direct charging will cost at a slower pace than the SFC pace. Compatible with Galaxy A40, Galaxy A50, Galaxy A6 2018 A600, Galaxy A6+ 2018 A605, Galaxy A7 2018 A750, Galaxy A70, Galaxy A8 2018 A530, Galaxy A9 2018 A920, Galaxy A90, Galaxy Fold, Galaxy S10 Lite SM-G970, Galaxy S10 SM-G973, Galaxy S10 Plus SM-G975, Galaxy S10 5G SM-G977, Galaxy Note 8 N950, Galaxy Note 9 N960, Galaxy Note 10, Galaxy Note 10+

Make positive this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
Ultra-fast charging
Provides as much as 25W of energy
